name: pihla folk
subtitle: pioneering folk music and traditions since 2002
heroParagraph1: pihla folk is a pioneer in the field of folk music and tradition through its creative production and acengy work.
heroParagraph2: founded in 2022, pihla folk is rooted in Baltic-Finnic traditions and languages. its modern activities encompass archaic and acoustic expressions as well as cross-genre music. Finno-Ugric also forms an important, broader dimension of pihla folkâ€™s work. its value base grows from these roots, challenging the individual-centered and fast-paced worldview that characterizes our time.
